ayas.text: lā ilāha illallāh, ilāhan wāḥidan wa naḥnu lahu muslimūn
lā ilāha illallāh, wa lā na`budu illā iyyāh, mukhliṣīna lahud dīn, walaw karihal mushrikūn
lā ilāha illallāh, rabbunā wa rabbu-ābā-inal awwalīn
lā ilāha illallāh, waḥdahu waḥdahu waḥdah, anjaza wa`dah, wanaṣara `abdah, wa-a`azza jundah
wahazamal aḥzāba waḥdah, falahul mulk, walahul ḥamd
wahuwa ḥayyun lā yamūt, biyadihil khayr, wahuwa `alā kulli shay-in qadīr
